mapper.select: select count(alarm_state) from alarm_user where alarm_state=0 and profile_num = #{profile_num} limit 5

select B.au_num, A.alarm_content, A.content_num, B.alarm_state from alarm_info A, alarm_user B where A.alarm_num = B.alarm_num AND B.profile_num = #{profile_num} AND date(A.alarm_date) >= date(subdate(now(), INTERVAL 3 DAY)) and date(A.alarm_date) <= date(now()) limit 5
mapper.update: update alarm_user set alarm_state=1 where au_num=#{au_num}
